players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. Diana was killed by him. We must vote Charlie out today."
You: "I trust Bob's investigation. Charlie must be the mafia. Let's vote him out."
Charlie: "I am the detective. I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. He is lying to frame me after killing Diana."
Bob: "Charlie is lying. I am the detective and he is mafioso. We have two claims but only one investigation. Vote Charlie to win."
Charlie: "Bob is lying. I investigated him and he is mafia. He killed Diana and is trying to frame me. Vote Bob to win."
You: "I believe Bob. Charlie is lying and we must vote him out to win."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Bob was arrested

Charlie: "Bob is lying. I investigated him and he is mafia. He killed Diana and is trying to frame me. Vote Bob to win."
Alice: "I believe Bob. Charlie is lying and we must vote him out to win."
